name: Nevermore I: Ravenswood Branch
description: The bounty of Tyria's nature is immense but not without limit, and as such must be cultivated, encouraged, and most of all protected. Get in touch with nature of Tyria in your quest to create the Ravenswood Branch, the first of the precursors to the legendary staff, Nevermore.
locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
